content: 1. My little darlings, I am lucky and honored to once again have a quality sponsor for this fun competition. I'm just making the rules so there's no dispute. Of course Bitmover will simplify the draw for us. While waiting to have the complete rules and the presentation of the prices (it's because I'm a little slow, but it's OK now, you can have a look at the the rules), I'm already giving you one so get ahead: you will need to make a quote from a well-known character about bitcoin (this can of course be an absurd assertion, a predictive or amusing quote, in short whatever you want). Once the quote has been written by another participant, you do not have the right to copy. If you really can't find one, look for one on this forum that you like. And if you really can't find it, give free rein to your creativity.I enter the names of the participants into the Bitmover magic tool only when they have given me a quote. => https://bitcoindata.science/giveaway-manager/Et merci à notre sponsor !!!!2. Hello sweeties,Look at the nice image our sponsor made  Rules : We have a beautiful pack for one winner. You must know that it's not possible to deliver in those countries : (but citizens of these countries can play of course !)AfghanistanBrazilCosta RicaIranIraqKosovoRussiaUkraineAnd imports can be a headache in these countries (but you can participate and offer your prize if you win):ChileBangladeshIndiaMontenegroNigeriaPakistanSerbiaTurkeyVenezuela1. very newbies can not participate, you must have a minimum of 10 funny or interesting messages and be in the forum since 3 months at least. Maybe for a next contest ?2. It will last 3 weeks, deadline 10 december, midnight (Paris time).=> After midnight 10 december, it will no longer be possible to participate.=> No possibility of getting satoshis instead of the prize.=> You can offer your prize to anyone you like.=> Cryptotag covers the delivery costs (except for the countries mentioned above where delivery is impossible or too complicatedCryptotag : https://cryptotag.io/All the products and services are designed and made with ❤️ in the Netherlands.Zeus : QuoteThe essential titanium crypto seed storage for every hodler. Includes everything you need to immortalize your recovery seed.Store up to 24 recovery words in 6mm thick bulletproof titanium.=> Lifelong guarantee.=> Zeus got maximum marks on Jameson Lopp's tests (heat, corrosion, crush, overall)Have a look here : https://cryptotag.io/testing-facility/Hodl BodlQuoteThe best Hodler is a properly hydrated hodler. Stay liquid. Stack sats. Hodl hydrated and show no coiners you are part of the hodlers universe.Keeps your drinks hot or coldStack SackQuoteThe perfect companion for your Zeus or Thor. Stack in style. Get the stack sack.PU Leather. Coolness: Extremely cool !We have a great chance to have a sponsor like Cryptotag, come and play !Good luck to all
